Vulnerability.Title: mousetweaks bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: The mousetweaks package provides mouse accessibility enhancements for the GNOME desktop, such as performing various clicks without using any hardware button. The options can be accessed through the Accessibility table of the Mouse Preferences of GNOME Control Center or through command-line. For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Release Notes linked from the References section. Users of mousetweaks are advised to upgrade to this updated package. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
